articles.author: Erika Edwards, Berkeley Lovelace Jr.
articles.title: CDC hasn't changed Covid guidelines yet: Here’s what you need to know - NBC News
articles.description: People who test positive for Covid should still isolate for five days according to the CDC, even though many Americans are already ignoring the policy.
articles.content: People who test positive for Covid should still isolate for five days, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, even though many Americans are already ignoring the policy. That gu… [+3585 chars]
